name: Rocket Ranger
description:
Rocket Ranger is an action, strategy and arcade game developed by Cinemaware. It was originally released in 1988. KEMCO published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Rocket Ranger on Commodore / Amiga, iOS, Apple II and Android.
It was produced by Gregg Barnett, Jim Simmons and Rob Landeros. It was directed by Gregg Barnett. It was scored by Bill Williams, Bob Lindstrom, Jim Simmons and Tania Smith.
